article_title: U.S. takes rocket fire to North Korea's doorstep
article_text: As North Korea fires two more rockets into the sea, the U.S. is flexing its own muscles south of the border. James Pearson reports from an American military live-fire drill, as tension ramps up on the Korean peninsula.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Thomson Reuters

article_summary:
As North Korea fires two more rockets into the sea, the U.S. is flexing its own muscles south of the border.
James Pearson reports from an American military live-fire drill, as tension ramps up on the Korean peninsula.
